name: Shinobi no Dokutsu
description:
Shinobi No Dokutsu is a short game where you try to speedrun to the end of each of the 30 rooms available.

It plays pretty much like an 8bit action-platformer classic.

It has a button pressure sensible jump, a slash, a roll, a button pressure sensible walljump, you can hang, and even run on the roof just like a real Shinobi!

Give it a try! It's Free!

PS: Gamepad is recommended for better results, but you can also play with keyboard.
